function.name: file.save
function.description: Saves or overwrites a text file with specified content to a relative path in the workspace.

path.description: Relative path of the file, e.g., 'my_notes.txt' or 'project/docs/api.md'.

content.description: The full text content to save in the file.

function.name: file.read
function.description: Reads and returns the full text content of a specified file from a relative path in the workspace.

path.description: The relative path of the file to read.

function.name: file.list
function.description: Returns a list of all files in a specified directory.

path.description: The relative path of the directory to list. Defaults to the workspace root '.'

function.name: file.append
function.description: Adds content to the end of a file at a relative path, creating it if it doesn't exist.

path.description: The relative path of the file to append to.

function.name: file.delete
function.description: Permanently deletes a specified file at a relative path.

path.description: The relative path of the file to delete.

function.name: file.find
function.description: Recursively searches for files in the secure directory by a name pattern (e.g., '*.py') and/or by text content using a regular expression.

name_pattern.description: A shell wildcard pattern to match filenames, like '*.txt' or 'project_*.*'.

content_regex.description: A regular expression to search for within file contents, like 'API_KEY' or '^import'.

function.name: file.compare
function.description: Compares the contents of two text files and shows the differences in a 'diff' format. Useful for tracking changes.

file1.description: The relative path of the first file for comparison.

file2.description: The relative path of the second file for comparison.

function.name: fs.move
function.description: Moves or renames a file or directory within the workspace.

source.description: The source path of the item to move.
